cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System Metadata Profile of ISO 19115
Seawater Carbon Dioxide (CO2) Content from the Burke-o-Lator pCO2/TCO2 Analyzer located at Bamfield Marine Sciences Centre, Bamfield, BC, Canada (Provisional)

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: Teneur en dioxyde de carbone (CO2) de l'eau de mer provenant de l'analyseur pCO2/tCO2 Burke-o-Lator situ√© au Bamfield Marine Sciences Centre, Bamfield, Colombie-Britannique, Canada (provisoire)

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This dataset includes measurements of the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (pCO2), temperature, and salinity made on seawater drawn continuously from a 20-m intake at the Bamfield Marine Sciences Centre in Bamfield, BC, Canada. The collection of these data utilizes a Burke-o-Lator (BoL) pCO2/TCO2 analyzer and began August 30, 2023. The Burke-o-Lator (BoL) pCO2/TCO2 analyzer measures carbon dioxide partial pressure (pCO2) and total dissolved inorganic carbon (TCO2) from a flow-through seawater stream and from seawater collected in discrete samples. The BoL is paired with a SBE 45 Thermosalinograph to measure seawater temperature and salinity. These data provide valuable information on patterns in marine carbonate chemistry and ocean acidification within Barkley Sound waters being supplied to the Bamfield Marine Sciences Centre and the Nova Harvest Ltd. shellfish hatchery.

mcc:description.gco:CharacterString: EPSG::5829 - Instantaneous Water Level height - Height relative to instantaneous water level uncorrected for tide. Not specific to any location or epoch.

mcc:description.gco:CharacterString: We clean and replace LI840A components as necessary and do not send units in for service unless absolutely required. In general, calibration function offsets are tracked and used as a metric of drift. When the calibration function offset exceeds 30, the unit would be cleaned and rezeroed / respanned using the high CO2 gas standard.
Sea-Bird Electronics SBE 45 MicroTSG Thermosalinograph; Honeywell or Omega Pressure Sensors and Fast Response Resistance Temperature Detectors
